Public Class TransportBindingElementImporter Implements IPolicyImportExtension, IWsdlImportExtension
type TransportBindingElementImporter = class interface IWsdlImportExtension interface IPolicyImportExtension

summary.span: 從附加原則運算式的 [Web 服務描述語言](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) \(英文\) (WSDL) 文件匯入標準傳輸繫結元素。

span.span: Imports standard transport binding elements from [Web Services Description Language](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) (WSDL) documents with attached policy expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TransportBindingElementImporter` 型別是 和 介面的實作。The `TransportBindingElementImporter` type is an implementation of the and interfaces. 它會從 WSDL 服務中繼資料匯入 、、、、 和 執行個體。It imports the , , , , , and instances from WSDL service metadata. 匯入這些 型別時，`TransportBindingElementImporter` 型別也會從 WSDL 中繼資料匯入定址資訊。When these types are imported, the `TransportBindingElementImporter` type also imports the addressing information from the WSDL metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: void IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport (System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection wsdlDocuments, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet xmlSchemas, System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Xml.XmlElement> policy);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport(class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection wsdlDocuments, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet xmlSchemas, class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Xml.XmlElement> policy) cil managed
Sub BeforeImport (wsdlDocuments As ServiceDescriptionCollection, xmlSchemas As XmlSchemaSet, policy As ICollection(Of XmlElement)) Implements IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport

virtual void System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport(System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionCollection ^ wsdlDocuments, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ xmlSchemas, System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Xml::XmlElement ^> ^ policy) = System::ServiceModel::Description::IWsdlImportExtension::BeforeImport;

param.name: wsdlDocuments
param.span: 要匯入之 WSDL 文件的集合。

span.span: The collection of WSDL documents that are to be imported.

param.name: xmlSchemas
param.span: 要匯入之 XML 結構描述文件的集合。

span.span: The collection of XML Schema documents that are to be imported.

param.name: policy
param.span: 要匯入之原則判斷提示的集合。

span.span: The collection of policy assertions that are to be imported.

summary.span: 將自訂原則判斷提示加入至要匯入之 WSDL 文件中的 WSDL 繫結。

span.span: Adds custom policy assertions to the WSDL bindings in WSDL documents that are to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將原則運算式附加至已經附加原則的 WSDL 繫結。This method attaches a policy expression to WSDL bindings that already have attached policies. 新增的原則運算式包含自訂原則判斷提示，其中包含來自 SOAP 繫結的 SOAP 傳輸 URI。The added policy expression contains a custom policy assertion that contains the SOAP transport URI from the SOAP binding. 匯入端點時會應用這個原則判斷提示，以便匯入正確的傳輸繫結項目。This policy assertion is used when importing the endpoint to import the correct transport binding element.

span.span: The for the contract binding element.

summary.span: 如果尚未從附加至 WSDL 的原則匯入 ，便從 WSDL 連接埠匯入定址資訊並從 SOAP 傳輸 URI 匯入 或 。

span.span: Imports addressing information from the WSDL port and imports an or an from the SOAP transport URI if a is not already imported from policy attached to the WSDL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果匯入的繫結包含不是由此型別匯入的 ，這個方法就不會匯入附加至 WSDL 的定址資訊。This method does not import addressing information attached to the WSDL if the imported binding contains a that is not imported by this type.
